sources.title: Southward, Ho!
sources.description: Reb soldiers Roy (Roy Rogers) and Gabby (George Hayes) return to Texas after the Civil War. The Union Colonel (Wade Boteler) they find in command is a fair man but his subordinate Captain (Arthur Loft) and his men are out to rob and cheat the Texans.

sources.title: Southward Ho! (1939) Roy Rogers - Classic Western
sources.description:
Romance and lawlessness...ride the Texas horizon! In post Civil War Texas a former Union officer is the government's chief law enforcement official and tax collector. Roy discovers that the man is also the head of an outlaw gang.

Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: Jack Natteford, John Rathmell  
Stars: Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, George 'Gabby' Hayes
Genres: Classics, Western

@CCC socials
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics -

metadata.Plot: Reb soldiers Roy and Gabby return to Texas after the Civil War. The Union Colonel they find in command is a fair man but his subordinate Captain and his men are out to rob and cheat the Texans. After the Texans give up their guns the Captain has the Colonel murdered and now Roy must find a way to retrieve the confiscated guns.
metadata.Writer: Jack Natteford, John Rathmell, Gerald Geraghty
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, George 'Gabby' Hayes
